Text: Hi there,  I am new to this and was wondering can you use android apps and games on a tablet?  I am getting a 10' vital with android 4.0 and was hoping someone could help me..any ideas?
from scadotte again, I know I can't use the phone specific apps, i was thinking more like the readers and games ...

@scadotte

Most android applications work in tablets too.Also some applications/games are only for phone or only for tablet.It stated in the info if these are for only one platform
